title: IFrame Checker
description: Check if a website can be embedded in an iframe
invalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://
timeoutError: Request timed out. The website took too long to respond.
connectionRefusedDetail: The website actively refused the connection attempt. This usually means the site has security measures preventing iframe embedding.
footer: Test any website's iframe compatibility instantly
copyright: All rights reserved. Built with ❤️ for web developers worldwide.
securityError: This is likely due to X-Frame-Options or Content Security Policy restrictions.
emptyResponse: The website returned an empty response, possibly blocking the embed.
blockedRedirect: The website redirected to a blocked page.
networkError: There might be network connectivity issues or the site might be unavailable.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred while trying to embed the website.
howToUseStep1: Enter the URL of the target website in the input box.
howToUseStep3: View the target website's content below or receive a message explaining why embedding is not allowed.
whatIsIframeContent: An iframe (inline frame) is an HTML element that allows embedding another HTML page within a parent page. It's widely used for displaying external content, such as videos or widgets, within a webpage.
howToUseHtmlTitle: How to Use iframes in HTML
howToUseHtmlContent: To embed a webpage using an iframe in HTML:
whyBlockedContent: Some websites cannot be embedded in iframes due to security measures like X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy. These headers protect against clickjacking and other vulnerabilities.
aboutContent: IFrame Checker helps users test if a website can be embedded using an iframe. Whether you're a developer or simply curious, our tool provides instant results and helpful insights about iframe compatibility.
